mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE ID = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT COMMENTS FROM PRODUCT_COMMENTS AS PC LEFT JOIN PRODUCT AS P ON P.ID = PC.PRODUCT_ID WHERE P.ID = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER)
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE NAME = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT REMAINS FROM PRODUCT WHERE ID = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET REMAINS = REMAINS - #{productAmount, jdbcType=FLOAT} WHERE ID = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT U.USERNAME,C.COMMENTS,C.USERID,C.COMMENTDATE FROM PRODUCT_COMMENTS AS C LEFT JOIN USER AS U ON C.USERID = U.ID WHERE PRODUCTID = #{productId, jdbcType=INTEGER} LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset, jdbcType=INTEGER}
